story_teamaquamagma_01_09000/2401_1001_0: Ma’am, I have something to report!
I just spotted Groudon a while ago.
Really...? Where is it? Take me there!

But you know...just finding it isn’t
very interesting...

Instead, you should use the power of your sync
stone to control Groudon and smash Team Aqua!
story_teamaquamagma_01_09000/2401_1001_1:
If you do that, our leader, Maxie, will be happy
as well!

Tell me... How can I control Groudon...with my
sync stone?

Gehehe! This’ll make it easier for us to carry out
our schemes!
